my-hand-description: Now that your hand has been connected, you can drive her easily with the differents controllers below.
learning-description: You'll find here all the useful documentation for Hackberry hand usage.
move-open: Move the cursor to select the Open position
move-close: Move the cursor to select the Close position
sensor-calib-1: Wear the sensor on the arm that drives the Hackberry hand
sensor-calib-4: Once started, generate a muscular activity on the sensor for 10 seconds (opening and closing hand gesture).
sensor-calib-5: After 10 seconds, the sensor will be calibrated and the hand will resume normal operation.
